wms_article_body.body: South Korean mobile carrier KT Corp. saw its second-quarter 2025 operating profit rise 105 percent from a year ago. KT announced in a regulatory filing on Monday that its preliminary consolidated operating profit for the second quarter of the year was 1.01 trillion won ($726.76 million), up 105.4 percent from the same period a year ago. The figure was 10.6 percent higher than the market forecast of 917.9 billion won compiled by Yonhap Infomax Co. Revenue for the April to June period rose 13.5 percent year-on-year to 7.43 trillion won, while net profit climbed 78.6 percent to 733.3 billion won.
